channel.title: Project Ricochet 2
channel.description: Welcome to Half-Life 2 Episode 3! [img]https://i.imgur.com/Q0bJQsk.png[/img] As we know Half-Life 2 Episode 4:Return To The Ravenholm was made by Arkane Studio in years of 2006-2009.In mid-2008 first Half-Life 2 Episode 3 concept artworks were leaked.After cancelation of both further episodes.In 2015 we have updates one of them is Dota 2:Reborn Half-Life 3 update. I'm leader of this project.I'm glad of it.I'm re-editor of Marc Laidlaw's Half-Life 2 Episode 3 script.I'm looking for programmers,artists,sound composers,map designers and enemy designers.I think CG Animation Entertainment is involved I keep paying 30$ them for being involved with Project Ricochet 2.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Ricochet 2
item.dc:creator: MisterDigitalGuy
item.description:
I usually frown upon disassembling a statement and responding to each part individually, but it looks like it might be necessary if I’m going to get a point across.

TheHalf-Life3:

Do you think I have to think with logic?

As JeffMOD said, yes, you do.

TheHalf-Life3:

Why you don’t want to make Half-Life 3(hl2ep3 and hl2ep4)?

I thought you were in charge of making it.

And if you want someone to help you with it, at least act somewhat dignified.

TheHalf-Life3:

Please tell me will memes solve everything?

Can’t be any worse than writing a poorly-worded rambling.

TheHalf-Life3:

Excuse me are you lazy and try to avoid progress of Half-Life 3?

Excuse me, but did you just call someone who doesn’t even work for you and hasn’t done anything on this project “lazy”? And how, exactly, is he “avoiding progress of Half-Life 3” if he’s not even working on it?

Unless of course that is the point- you’re saying he’s lazy because he isn’t working on the project. If that’s the case, then all I have to say is- seriously? Are you really trying to compel him to work for you? Well, let me just say it’s not going to work. All it’s going to do is make people less likely to want to work with you. And since you seem to want people to work with you on this, you’re going to need to adopt a different strategy.

Unless, of course, it’s just you not thinking with logic.

TheHalf-Life3:

Why are you not patient?Please tell me why?

Because you’re very good at making people’s patience wear thin.

TheHalf-Life3:

Why are you rudely doubtting I’ll fail everything?

As JeffMOD said, we aren’t.

If you think with logic, you’ll figure out what we mean.

TheHalf-Life3:

Please explain me?

I’d say something about how your grammar gives this sentence a different meaning than you intended, but I doubt it would change anything.

TheHalf-Life3:

Please give me a chance?

sigh

TheHalf-Life3:

It’s good sense of humour.It’s so funny.What funny story IsterDigitalGuy-Tommy Wiseau impression.Great job JeffMOD user.

Why thank you! And JeffMOD usually does do a good job. (Don’t care if you were being sarcastic)

Also, who’s IsterDigitalGuy? Is he a new forum user or something?

Oh, and I don’t know why, but I’m feeling a strong sense of Deja vu. It’s almost as if you’ve made this exact same post before.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Ricochet 2
item.dc:creator: TheHalf-Life3
item.description:
CPU:
TheHalf-Life3:

I’d like to apologize for my Half-Life 3 mania.For the next time I think I should read your guidelines about making fan projects,but it’s very tough rules likely starmen.net society to understand and follow to them.

TheHalf-Life3:

We know that Half-Life 3 is hybrid of Half-Life 2 Beta,Half-Life 2 Episode 3 and Half-Life 2 Episode 4 Return To The Revenholm(Borealis the most memorable chapter cut from Half-Life 2 early development).I heard urban legend that Gabe Newell will never make Half-Life 3 because working with Microsoft he made only Windows 1.0,Windows 2.0,Windows 2.1 and Windows 2.2.Me like Neil Druckmann and me want to revive the sequel of Valve Software abandoned and legendary Half-Life future franchise.Vlave New Network’s Tyler McVicker will be disapointed if Half-Life 2 Episode 3 and Half-Life 2 Episode 4 Return To The Ravenholm if years of 2030,2040,but 3007 will be final release date of Half-Life 3.I warn you my first model from Half-Life 3 of Alyx Vance may look worse than Omikon The Nomad Soul.

TheHalf-Life3:

I’d like to apologize for my negative behaviour.I have no idea how can I be responsible for Half-Life 3 I start in 2020 when I spend more time on learning 3D modelling.

TheHalf-Life3:

HALF-LIFE 2 EPISODE 3 IS great example for source engine 2 inside half-life 2 episode 2 currently i’m hd remaking duke nukem 1,2 plus jazz jackrabbit 1 and 2.

Okay.I’ll be polite this time.Do you think I have to think with logic?Why you don’t want to make Half-Life 3(hl2ep3 and hl2ep4)?Please tell me will memes solve everything?Excuse me are you lazy and try to avoid progress of Half-Life 3?Why are you not patient?Please tell me why?Why are you rudely doubtting I’ll fail everything?Please explain me?Please give me a chance?I’m begging you for a mercy.
It’s good sense of humour.It’s so funny.What funny story IsterDigitalGuy-Tommy Wiseau impression.Great job JeffMOD user.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Ricochet 2
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Shooting down his dreams, I would never!
In fact, I got my uncle (he works at Valve) to send me one of his game designs so it can be made in Project Ricochet 2.

[attach=4400,none,1159][/attach]

barrelsofnone.png1159×999 29.2 KB

Read full topic

item.title: Project Ricochet 2
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
First off, “Episode 4” wasn’t even really a thing. It was an idea a couple people at Arkane tossed around and then proposed to Valve because Viktor Antonov works there now. It never got off the ground, and it never had any solid design or work done on it aside from a couple pages of concept art.

Secondly, We do not have to make Episode 3. Neither does Valve, if they chose not to. As much as I hate to admit it, there is no requirement for another Half-Life game to ever exist in order for the world to keep going.

Thirdly, Yes, you do have to think with logic. That’s how thinking works.

Don’t worry though, we’re not doubting you’ll fail everything.

Read full topic

item.description:
CPU:
TheHalf-Life3:

I’d like to apologize for my Half-Life 3 mania.For the next time I think I should read your guidelines about making fan projects,but it’s very tough rules likely starmen.net society to understand and follow to them.

TheHalf-Life3:

We know that Half-Life 3 is hybrid of Half-Life 2 Beta,Half-Life 2 Episode 3 and Half-Life 2 Episode 4 Return To The Revenholm(Borealis the most memorable chapter cut from Half-Life 2 early development).I heard urban legend that Gabe Newell will never make Half-Life 3 because working with Microsoft he made only Windows 1.0,Windows 2.0,Windows 2.1 and Windows 2.2.Me like Neil Druckmann and me want to revive the sequel of Valve Software abandoned and legendary Half-Life future franchise.Vlave New Network’s Tyler McVicker will be disapointed if Half-Life 2 Episode 3 and Half-Life 2 Episode 4 Return To The Ravenholm if years of 2030,2040,but 3007 will be final release date of Half-Life 3.I warn you my first model from Half-Life 3 of Alyx Vance may look worse than Omikon The Nomad Soul.

TheHalf-Life3:

I’d like to apologize for my negative behaviour.I have no idea how can I be responsible for Half-Life 3 I start in 2020 when I spend more time on learning 3D modelling.

TheHalf-Life3:

HALF-LIFE 2 EPISODE 3 IS great example for source engine 2 inside half-life 2 episode 2 currently i’m hd remaking duke nukem 1,2 plus jazz jackrabbit 1 and 2.

[align=center][/align]

Okay.I’ll be polite this time.Do you think I have to think with logic?Why you don’t want to make Half-Life 3(hl2ep3 and hl2ep4)?Please tell me will memes solve everything?Excuse me are you lazy and try to avoid progress of Half-Life 3?Why are you not patient?Please tell me why?Why are you rudely doubtting I’ll fail everything?Please explain me?Please give me a chance?I’m begging you for a mercy.

item.description:
TheHalf-Life3:

I’d like to apologize for my Half-Life 3 mania.For the next time I think I should read your guidelines about making fan projects,but it’s very tough rules likely starmen.net society to understand and follow to them.

TheHalf-Life3:

We know that Half-Life 3 is hybrid of Half-Life 2 Beta,Half-Life 2 Episode 3 and Half-Life 2 Episode 4 Return To The Revenholm(Borealis the most memorable chapter cut from Half-Life 2 early development).I heard urban legend that Gabe Newell will never make Half-Life 3 because working with Microsoft he made only Windows 1.0,Windows 2.0,Windows 2.1 and Windows 2.2.Me like Neil Druckmann and me want to revive the sequel of Valve Software abandoned and legendary Half-Life future franchise.Vlave New Network’s Tyler McVicker will be disapointed if Half-Life 2 Episode 3 and Half-Life 2 Episode 4 Return To The Ravenholm if years of 2030,2040,but 3007 will be final release date of Half-Life 3.I warn you my first model from Half-Life 3 of Alyx Vance may look worse than Omikon The Nomad Soul.

TheHalf-Life3:

I’d like to apologize for my negative behaviour.I have no idea how can I be responsible for Half-Life 3 I start in 2020 when I spend more time on learning 3D modelling.

TheHalf-Life3:

HALF-LIFE 2 EPISODE 3 IS great example for source engine 2 inside half-life 2 episode 2 currently i’m hd remaking duke nukem 1,2 plus jazz jackrabbit 1 and 2.

item.title: Project Ricochet 2
item.dc:creator: Rezaltas
item.description:
I think people who played the original will avoid this like the plague. We need to reach the children for this one if we want an audience, so I suggest we add plentiful memes in order to draw them in! Because screw writing original stuff, we can just recycle tried and true jokes, like “All your cake are belong to us!” and “The barrel roll was a lie!”

Read full topic
